subtopic.sub_topic_name: Location of administrative areas and cities

learning_objectives.description: identify on a map: the administrative areas of Pakistan
identify on a map: named cities: Islamabad, Muree, Rawalpindi, Gujranwala, Lahore, Faisalabad, Multan, Sialkot, Peshawar, Chitral, Gilgit, Hyderabad, Karachi, Quetta and Gwadar.
